node.title: Shrimpy Augmented Reality Mobile App/Game

content.value: An application/game to help improve customer engagement, the project deliverables were as follows:

Link the ordering website already live into the application in the most affordable way possible, to achieve this we incorporated a in-app browser into the application that opens the ordering page of the Company's already live website.
An augmented reality game that:
is an infinite arcade game with a theme centered or based on the Company's brand.
takes advantage of ARKit and AR-Core API's so the augmented reality game is SLAM based and not target based.
allows users to redeem points in any restaurant branch for discounts on orders
has a built in system for creating screenshots with serial numbers to avoid re-redemption of already claimed rewards.
Watch Demo Video

node.description: An augmented reality application/game for a famous sea-food restaurant chain in the Middle East

node.title: Virtual Reality Roller Coaster

content.value: The VR roller coaster was an exciting project. A combination of software and hardware; I designed and built a device to track the 3D orientation of the cart using 9DOF sensors calibrated to avoid outside magnetic interference coming off the other arcade devices. The device is also equipped with a hall sensor to measure the speed of the cart and a Bluetooth module for communication, all connected to an Arduino microcontroller.

Using Unity 3D, I developed a mobile space game targeted at Samsung's Gear VR, which takes in the sensor readings (via Bluetooth) and uses those values as the speed & rotation variables for the spaceship in the game.

node.description: First VR roller coaster in the MENA region

node.title: FK Augmented Reality App/Game

content.value: An application/game that is centered around new/emerging technology to help revive a rather aged, but still well-known and loved, theme-park/arcade chain in the MENA region. I proposed an augmented reality infinite arcade game based with a theme that reflects the company's brand. The target (an image the game environment appears over when in view of the camera) would be the image on the swipe card their customers buy, refill, and use at any of their many of their locations.
The application deliverables:
Works across iPad, iPhone, & Android devices. Minimum iPhone 5 and above, iPad Mini 1 and above, Android minimum unspecified.
The UI of the main and loading screens should to be dynamic/animated.
Link each social media account they have to a UI button to direct user traffic towards those social media accounts.
A button to initiate a call to their customer service number
Allow users to check the balance of any re-fillable swipe card purchased from any one of their many branches.
A map that shows the user's current location, and every branch/location within the bounds of the map. Each location when interacted with (clicked) should present the user with two options;

Navigate To —> Initiates navigation by opening the Google Maps application, or a page of Google Maps on the primary browser, with the user's current location set to the starting point and the selected location as the destination to make the process of starting the journey effortless for the user.

View Location —> Opens a 360° degree view, or image gallery if 360° texture unavailable, giving the user an 
enticing view of the location selected.
An augmented reality game that:
Is an infinite arcade style game with a theme that reflects, or is closely related and can be associated with, the company's brand.
Initiates the game environment when the front of their branded swipe card is in view of the augmented reality camera over, and according to the scale of, the card.

Allow users to convert game points/achievements to redeemable credit on the swipe card (otherwise only available through monetary purchase) which may be used at any of their locations (on rides/rewards/games/etc.).
Encrypted and cheat proof.
Communicates all redeemed scores, as well as the swipe card account number, to their self-hosted Microsoft SQL databases.
Watch Demo Video

node.description: An application/game that is centered around new/emerging technology to help revive a rather aged, but still well-known and loved, theme-park/arcade chain in the MENA region
